review_data.title: Fulin: The ultimate nightmare
review_data.content: Fulin: The ultimate nightmare A stressed out waitress permanently shouting over the premises (“is very stressfull”) for hardly any guests. A red curry that looked and tasted like a ketchup sauce, my partner’s prawns too salty. When I mentionned it the simple answer was “sorry”....More

review_data.title: Gemütlicher Abend mit Freunden

review_data.title: Sehr gut
review_data.content: Sehr feines Essen, sauber und gepflegt;) Freundliches Personal Werden wieder vorbeikommen:) Rindfleisch mit hausgemachter Sauce ist der absolute Hammer

review_data.title: Sehr lecker
review_data.content: Gemütliches Lokal, das Personal ist sehr nett und das Essen wirklich lecker. Wir kommen gerne wieder

review_data.title: friendly staff and very good food
review_data.content: friendly staff and very good food. very good value for money. lots of options. really friendly service.

review_data.title: Very good food for a good price
review_data.content: Nice evening in a very friendly atmosphere. Service was really helpful, quick and friendly. We took the ‘all you can eat option’ and we had so much to eat! Very good food for a very good price.

review_data.title: Authentisches China Restaurant
review_data.content: Sehr nette Bedienung und authentische Küche zu fairen Preisen. Perfekt um nach der Arbeit einzukehren. Komme bestimmt wieder.
